sect3.title: Configuration Information
sect3.para: The library directory /opt/kde/lib should appear in /etc/ld.so.conf so that ldd can find the shared libraries. The following command will add it if it is missing:

userinput.command:
cat >> /etc/ld.so.conf << "EOF" # Begin kde addition to /etc/ld.so.conf
/opt/kde/lib
# End kde addition EOF ldconfig
